quote: If you don’t want me to be in love with you, you’re going to have to stop looking so lovely. First thing tomorrow I’m having your maids sew some potato sacks together for you.
quote_letters: IF YOU DONT WANT ME TO BE IN LOVE WITH YOU YOURE GOING TO HAVE TO STOP LOOKING SO LOVELY FIRST THING TOMORROW IM HAVING YOUR MAIDS SEW SOME POTATO SACKS TOGETHER FOR YOU
